title: [Firefly Villa, Garden]
description: Brightly colored flowers speckle the thick, verdant green bushes that threaten to choke the seashell paths that lead in and out of the other portions of the garden, their mother-of-pearl bellies glittering in the golden sunlight.  A thatch-roofed red cedar hut occupies much of the space in this section of the garden, its roof beaded with dew and its walls slick with teardrops of moisture.

Brightly colored flowers speckle the thick, verdant green bushes that threaten to choke the seashell paths that lead in and out of the other portions of the garden, their mother-of-pearl bellies glittering in the silvery moonlight.  A thatch-roofed red cedar hut occupies much of the space in this section of the garden, its roof beaded with dew and its walls slick with teardrops of moisture.
